website_summaries.verdict: A durable jacket that works well to ward off both wind and rain. Includes fun extras like a phone pocket.
pros: Adjustable wrist straps and elastic drawstring
Inner pockets include one for your phone with headphone loop
cons: Runs small, especially if you want to wear more than a T-shirt beneath
Zipper can be hard to thread

customer_reviews.title: nice jacket, good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: instantly warm. i dont do a lot of layers, dont need them here, so this is an adequate fit. i really dont like the bright white logos on the cuffs, very tacky, will black them out with perm marker. hence 4 stars recovering from illness and i am 6ft tall and have a 49in waist and chest. this fits spot on with an undershirt and a polo - i bought the 3x size jacket. although not tested, this will have some water resistance. adjustable cuffs with velcro and some nice wind resistance. stylish and functional, good deep pockets, nice pocket on the chest too. very happy with this purchase and confident you will be too.
customer_reviews.author: John Arena

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cool weather jacket.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stylish and well sewn jacket in my opinion. I ordered this in men's small and found the torso/tummy area a little too roomy for my taste, also the sleeves are a slight bit long for me. So I reluctantly returned it. It would be great to wear on a casual evening out and I really liked its quality, however I chose a New Balance brand softshell jacket over this as it fit slightly better and felt warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Run hike Dan

customer_reviews.title: Other than that the jacket is nice and has protected me in heavy rain
customer_reviews.text: Inside zipper to one of the pockets is frozen. Still haven't been able to make it work while trying multiple techniques to unfreeze it. Other than that the jacket is nice and has protected me in heavy rain, sleet and on the slopes! A bit too hot for spring and fall but perfect for late fall and winter.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron and Amber

customer_reviews.title: High quality jacket, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: No logos on left breast and adjustable hem were requirements. Ordered the Gear jacket from Hanes, it was flimsy and cheap, got returned. Very pleased with the Viking, high quality jacket with all the features and styling I wanted. Usually between a XL and XXL, ordered the XXL, perfect fit. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket and seems durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my oldest son for Christmas. He loves it. The fit is as expected. Nice jacket and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Senz

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a XL not a 3x
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit as described. VERY small for an 3x. Fit like a XL. Sad cause seemed like a nice jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Customer97121

customer_reviews.title: perfect liner for my Viking Professional THOR jacket
customer_reviews.text: perfect liner for my Viking Professional THOR jacket. the inner pockets were exactly what I was looking fro as a travel jacket liner.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket, but it seems a bit small than other jackets the same size.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lightweight jacket
customer_reviews.text: My son, who wont wear a coat, loves this jacket. For the price I paid, the quality is far beyond what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect casual jacket for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I use this jacket every day walking my dog. Good storage pockets and nice quality. Even though we haven't had any rain, it should do great at weather protection.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, prefect fit and works great with my Viking rain jacket
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Love this winter jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this winter jacket! Keeps me dry and snow/rain off. Sleeves are a little long, but I think it could be designed this way to fit over gloves.
customer_reviews.author: James carlisle

customer_reviews.title: great jacket great price!
customer_reviews.text: nice jacket, lots of pockets. Very comfortable. I choose an XXl so I can wear a sweatshirt under it.
customer_reviews.author: CJM Rochester, NY

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jacket. Very lightweight, but fights against cold, winds and rain.
customer_reviews.author: akirsman

customer_reviews.title: Large Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something exactly like this for a while. I wanted a rain jacket that kept out of water but didn't have a hoodie. I also wanted something that seemed sleek and not bulky like a lot of other rain jackets. This rain jacket fits perfectly on me, I got a Large and my weight is 175lbs, height is 6ft. I think it would be tighter on someone that isn't really slim, but if you can wear slim fit clothes I would highly recommend this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: YTJACK

customer_reviews.title: Very nice coat, well lined
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coat, well lined. Just thought in would have a Peacoat length. It's much shorter than Peacoat. As for size, it runs on the smaller side. Purchased a medium for my 23 year old son, that medium built and had to exchange it for a large
customer_reviews.author: Grace

product_meta.title: Viking Soft Shell Jacket
product_meta.description: Viking Soft Shell Jacket/Liner is constructed of 100% polyester with an anti-pill micro-fleece collar, waterproof zippers, elastic drawcord with toggle adjustments at hem, adjustable wrist straps, drop back tail. Tech pocket with headphone loop inside left-chest and underarm venting for greater comfort.
feature_bullets: Waterproof zippers on lower front pockets and chest pocket
Anti-pill microfleece lined collar for greater comfort
Interior phone pocket and storage pocket
Adjustable wrist straps help seal out water and adjustable elastic waist
Drop back tail and side insert gussets for greater mobility
